title: Alternative medicine perception in France 2019 | Statista
author: Frédéric Michas; Aug
description: This statistic represents the general opinion of French people on alternative medicines in 2019.
cleaned_text: French people's opinion on alternative medicine 2019 [This statistic represents the general opinion of French people on alternative medicines in 2019. It shows that alternative medicines enjoyed a certain popularity in France, 91 percent of those surveyed thought that alternative medicines were effective in treating minor ailments.](#statisticContainer) Alternative medicine, also called complementary or integrative medicine among others, designates therapeutic practices residing outside classical medical science which originated from oriental, ancestral or innovative traditions. Among those alternative medicines, we can for example find acupuncture (from Chinese medicine), Ayurvedic medicine, herbal medicine, osteopathy or homeopathy.
